basics.name: Iván Szkiba
basics.label: System Architect @NNG
basics.headline: Becoming (a good) programmer is an endless adventure
basics.summary: I'm a software architect with hands on programming knowledge. I eager to keep my knowledge up to date, follow new technologies, software development methodologies, practice and promote them in my daily work.
